long_description: The Gregory Z65 Pack is ready to hit the trail and take you into the wilderness in comfort. You'll enjoy plenty of space for everything you need on your next extended multi-day backpacking trip. Ventilated back panel and harness with wrap-over padding on the hipbelt offer comfort and stability for the long haul. Die-cut foam on the harness and hipbelt adds breathability and decreases weight. CrossFlo(TM) DTS Suspension provides cooling airflow across the back without sacrificing load transfer; wire X-Frame transfers load weight to the lumbar pad and hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features a quick-draw closure and floating top lid with 2 pockets and key clip; U-shaped front zipper makes it easy to access the pack's depths. Interior sleeve with port accommodates a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Front bucket pocket and zippered pocket, 2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets and dual hipbelt pockets make it easy to organize and access essentials. The Gregory Z65 Pack features hideaway axe/trekking pole loops with secure attachments, side/bottom compression straps and an integrated, color-matched rain cover.
short_description: The Gregory Z65 Pack is ready to hit the trail and take you into the wilderness in comfort. You'll enjoy plenty of space for everything you need on your next extended multi-day backpacking trip.
